message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
